languages.text: "Ваша ручная истязательница, восхваляющая смерть, права — я знаю Немезита, я помогаю ему. И, как и он, я враг вам, {name}". {n}Адальберт повышает голос, и в мягком голосе раздаются глубокие, как раскаты грома, ноты обвинения.{/n} "Вам и вашему жестокому режиму, в котором жизнь — это грязь под ногами блюстителя, где человек не ест досыта, согбен от страха и не ведает надежды!"

"Your pet tormentor who extols death is right. I know Nemesite, and I assist him. Just like him, I am your enemy, {name}." {n}Adalbert raises his voice, and in the soft tenor, you hear notes of accusation as deep as rolling thunder.{/n} "And I am also the enemy of your cruel regime, where life is dirt under the enforcers' feet, where a man has nothing to eat, writhes in fear, and knows no hope!"
languages.original_text: "Ваша ручная истязательница, восхваляющая смерть, права — я знаю Немезита, я помогаю ему. И, как и он, я враг вам, {name}". {n}Адальберт повышает голос, и в мягком голосе раздаются глубокие, как раскаты грома, ноты обвинения.{/n} "Вам и вашему жестокому режиму, в котором жизнь — это грязь под ногами блюстителя, где человек не ест досыта, согбен от страха и не ведает надежды!"

traits.locale_text: "Your pet tormentor who extols death is right. I know Nemesite, and I abet him. And just like him, I am your enemy, {name}". {n}Adalbert raises his voice, and in the soft tenor there are notes of accusation as deep as rolling thunder.{/n} "And I am the enemy of your cruel regime, where life is dirt under the enforcers' feet, where man has nothing to eat, is writhing in fear, and knows no hope!"

Just like him, I am your enemy, {name}." {n}Adalbert raises his voice, and in the soft tenor, you hear notes of accusation as deep as rolling thunder.{/n} "And I am also the enemy of your cruel regime, where life is dirt under the enforcers' feet, where a man has nothing to eat, writhes in fear, and knows no hope!"

languages.text: "Euer Tormentor-Schoßhund, der den Tod so schätzt, hat recht. Ich kenne Nemesit, und ich unterstütze ihn. Genau wie er bin ich Euer Feind, {name}." {n}Adalbert erhebt seine Stimme, und in dem sanften Tenor hörst du sowohl Anklage als auch Donnergrollen.{/n} "Und ich bin auch der Feind Eures grausamen Regimes, in dem Leben nur Dreck unter den Füßen der Enforcer ist, in dem ein Mensch nichts zu essen bekommt, sich vor Angst windet und keine Hoffnung kennt!"
languages.original_text: "Your pet tormentor who extols death is right. I know Nemesite, and I assist him. Just like him, I am your enemy, {name}." {n}Adalbert raises his voice, and in the soft tenor, you hear notes of accusation as deep as rolling thunder.{/n} "And I am also the enemy of your cruel regime, where life is dirt under the enforcers' feet, where a man has nothing to eat, writhes in fear, and knows no hope!"

traits.locale_text: "Euer Tormentor-Schoßhund, der den Tod so schätzt, hat recht. Ich kenne Nemesit, und ich unterstütze ihn. Genau wie er bin ich Euer Feind, {name}." {n}Adalbert erhebt seine Stimme, und in dem sanften Tenor hörst du sowohl Anklage als auch Donnergrollen.{/n} "Und ich bin auch der Feind Eures grausamen Regimes, in dem Leben nur Dreck unter den Füßen der Enforcer ist, in dem ein Mensch nichts zu essen bekommt, sich vor Angst windet und keine Hoffnung kennt!"

languages.text: «Su mascota asesina y torturadora tiene razón. Conozco a Nemesitio y le presto ayuda. Al igual que él, yo soy su enemigo, {name}». {n}Adalbert levanta la voz, y en su suave discurso notas un tono acusatorio tan profundo como el retumbar de un trueno.{/n} «¡Y también soy enemigo de su cruel régimen, en el que la vida vale menos que la gravilla bajo las botas de los guardias, en el que las personas no tienen nada que comer, viven presa del miedo y no conocen la esperanza!
languages.original_text: "Your pet tormentor who extols death is right. I know Nemesite, and I assist him. Just like him, I am your enemy, {name}." {n}Adalbert raises his voice, and in the soft tenor, you hear notes of accusation as deep as rolling thunder.{/n} "And I am also the enemy of your cruel regime, where life is dirt under the enforcers' feet, where a man has nothing to eat, writhes in fear, and knows no hope!"

traits.locale_text: «Su mascota asesina y torturadora tiene razón. Conozco a Nemesitio y le presto ayuda. Al igual que él, yo soy su enemigo, {name}». {n}Adalbert levanta la voz, y en su suave discurso notas un tono acusatorio tan profundo como el retumbar de un trueno.{/n} «¡Y también soy enemigo de su cruel régimen, en el que la vida vale menos que la gravilla bajo las botas de los guardias, en el que las personas no tienen nada que comer, viven presa del miedo y no conocen la esperanza!

languages.text: 「死を賛美するあなたのペットの苦悩は正しい。私はネメサイトを知っているし、彼に力を貸している。彼と同じように、私はあなたの敵だ、{name}」{n}アダルバートは声を張り上げる。柔らかなテノールの中に、雷が鳴り響くように深い非難の声が聞こえた。{/n}「そして、私はあなたの非道な体制の敵でもある。そこで命はエンフォーサーの足下にある土で、人は食べるものもなく、恐怖に悶え、希望を知らない！」
languages.original_text: "Your pet tormentor who extols death is right. I know Nemesite, and I assist him. Just like him, I am your enemy, {name}." {n}Adalbert raises his voice, and in the soft tenor, you hear notes of accusation as deep as rolling thunder.{/n} "And I am also the enemy of your cruel regime, where life is dirt under the enforcers' feet, where a man has nothing to eat, writhes in fear, and knows no hope!"

traits.locale_text: 「死を賛美するあなたのペットの苦悩は正しい。私はネメサイトを知っているし、彼に力を貸している。彼と同じように、私はあなたの敵だ、{name}」{n}アダルバートは声を張り上げる。柔らかなテノールの中に、雷が鳴り響くように深い非難の声が聞こえた。{/n}「そして、私はあなたの非道な体制の敵でもある。そこで命はエンフォーサーの足下にある土で、人は食べるものもなく、恐怖に悶え、希望を知らない！」

languages.text: “你那个赞美死亡、折磨别人的宠物说得没错。我认识涅墨斯特，我协助了他。正如他一样，我也是你的敌人，{name}。”{n}阿达伯特抬高了声音。在他柔和的男高音中，你听到了责难的意味，仿佛隆隆的雷声一样深沉。{/n}“不仅如此，我也是你的残暴政权的敌人。你的人民像烂泥一样，被执法者踩在脚下。他们没有食物，没有希望，在恐惧中挣扎！”
languages.original_text: "Your pet tormentor who extols death is right. I know Nemesite, and I assist him. Just like him, I am your enemy, {name}." {n}Adalbert raises his voice, and in the soft tenor, you hear notes of accusation as deep as rolling thunder.{/n} "And I am also the enemy of your cruel regime, where life is dirt under the enforcers' feet, where a man has nothing to eat, writhes in fear, and knows no hope!"

traits.locale_text: “你那个赞美死亡、折磨别人的宠物说得没错。我认识涅墨斯特，我协助了他。正如他一样，我也是你的敌人，{name}。”{n}阿达伯特抬高了声音。在他柔和的男高音中，你听到了责难的意味，仿佛隆隆的雷声一样深沉。{/n}“不仅如此，我也是你的残暴政权的敌人。你的人民像烂泥一样，被执法者踩在脚下。他们没有食物，没有希望，在恐惧中挣扎！”

languages.text: « Votre tourmenteuse attitrée et chantre de la mort a raison. Je connais Némésite, et je l'aide dans sa quête de justice. Tout comme lui, je suis votre ennemi, {name}. » {n}Adalbert hausse le ton, et sa voix de ténor se fait aussi lourde d'accusations que le roulement du tonnerre sous un ciel d'orage.{/n} « Et je suis aussi l'ennemi de votre régime ô combien cruel, où la vie n'est que poussière sous les bottes des prévôts et où les petites gens meurent de faim et de désespoir sous votre règne de terreur ! »
languages.original_text: "Your pet tormentor who extols death is right. I know Nemesite, and I assist him. Just like him, I am your enemy, {name}." {n}Adalbert raises his voice, and in the soft tenor, you hear notes of accusation as deep as rolling thunder.{/n} "And I am also the enemy of your cruel regime, where life is dirt under the enforcers' feet, where a man has nothing to eat, writhes in fear, and knows no hope!"

traits.locale_text: « Votre tourmenteuse attitrée et chantre de la mort a raison. Je connais Némésite, et je l'aide dans sa quête de justice. Tout comme lui, je suis votre ennemi, {name}. » {n}Adalbert hausse le ton, et sa voix de ténor se fait aussi lourde d'accusations que le roulement du tonnerre sous un ciel d'orage.{/n} « Et je suis aussi l'ennemi de votre régime ô combien cruel, où la vie n'est que poussière sous les bottes des prévôts et où les petites gens meurent de faim et de désespoir sous votre règne de terreur ! »

languages.text: "Ölümü metheden evcil işkencecin haklı. Nemezit'i tanıyorum ve ona destek oluyorum. Tıpkı onun gibi ben de senin düşmanınım {name}." {n}Adalbert sesini yükseltiyor ve yumuşak tenor sesinin içinde bir şimşeğin gümbürtüsü kadar derin suçlama tınıları bulunuyor.{/n} "Ben ayrıca senin zalim hükümdarlığının da düşmanıyım. İnfazcılarının ayakları altındaki yaşamın çamurdan farksız olduğu, insanların yiyecek hiçbir şeyi olmadığı, korkuyla kıvrandığı ve umudun ne olduğunu bilmediği hükümdarlığının!"
languages.original_text: "Your pet tormentor who extols death is right. I know Nemesite, and I assist him. Just like him, I am your enemy, {name}." {n}Adalbert raises his voice, and in the soft tenor, you hear notes of accusation as deep as rolling thunder.{/n} "And I am also the enemy of your cruel regime, where life is dirt under the enforcers' feet, where a man has nothing to eat, writhes in fear, and knows no hope!"
